00033 /*
00034     HOW TEXTURE NODES WORK
00035 
00036     In contrast to Shader nodes, which place a color into the output
00037     stack when executed, Texture nodes place a TexDelegate* there. To
00038     obtain a color value from this, a node further up the chain reads
00039     the TexDelegate* from its input stack, and uses tex_call_delegate to
00040     retrieve the color from the delegate.
00041  
00042     comments: (ton)
00043 
00044     This system needs recode, a node system should rely on the stack, and 
00045     callbacks for nodes only should evaluate own node, not recursively go
00046     over other previous ones.
00047 */
00048 
00049 #include <assert.h>
00050 #include "node_texture_util.h"
00051 
00052 #define PREV_RES 128 /* default preview resolution */
00053 
00054 static void tex_call_delegate(TexDelegate *dg, float *out, TexParams *params, short thread)
00055 {
00056     if (dg->node->need_exec) {
00057         dg->fn(out, params, dg->node, dg->in, thread);
00058 
00059         if (dg->cdata->do_preview)
00060             tex_do_preview(dg->node, params->previewco, out);
00061     }
00062 }
00063 
00064 static void tex_input(float *out, int sz, bNodeStack *in, TexParams *params, short thread)
00065 {
00066     TexDelegate *dg = in->data;
00067     if (dg) {
00068         tex_call_delegate(dg, in->vec, params, thread);
00069     
00070         if (in->hasoutput && in->sockettype == SOCK_FLOAT)
00071             in->vec[1] = in->vec[2] = in->vec[0];
00072     }
00073     memcpy(out, in->vec, sz * sizeof(float));
00074 }
00075 
00076 void tex_input_vec(float *out, bNodeStack *in, TexParams *params, short thread)
00077 {
00078     tex_input(out, 3, in, params, thread);
00079 }
00080 
00081 void tex_input_rgba(float *out, bNodeStack *in, TexParams *params, short thread)
00082 {
00083     tex_input(out, 4, in, params, thread);
00084     
00085     if (in->hasoutput && in->sockettype == SOCK_FLOAT) {
00086         out[1] = out[2] = out[0];
00087         out[3] = 1;
00088     }
00089     
00090     if (in->hasoutput && in->sockettype == SOCK_VECTOR) {
00091         out[0] = out[0] * .5f + .5f;
00092         out[1] = out[1] * .5f + .5f;
00093         out[2] = out[2] * .5f + .5f;
00094         out[3] = 1;
00095     }
00096 }
00097 
00098 float tex_input_value(bNodeStack *in, TexParams *params, short thread)
00099 {
00100     float out[4];
00101     tex_input_vec(out, in, params, thread);
00102     return out[0];
00103 }
00104 
00105 void params_from_cdata(TexParams *out, TexCallData *in)
00106 {
00107     out->co = in->co;
00108     out->dxt = in->dxt;
00109     out->dyt = in->dyt;
00110     out->previewco = in->co;
00111     out->osatex = in->osatex;
00112     out->cfra = in->cfra;
00113     out->shi = in->shi;
00114     out->mtex = in->mtex;
00115 }
00116 
00117 void tex_do_preview(bNode *node, float *co, float *col)
00118 {
00119     bNodePreview *preview= node->preview;
00120 
00121     if (preview) {
00122         int xs= ((co[0] + 1.0f)*0.5f)*preview->xsize;
00123         int ys= ((co[1] + 1.0f)*0.5f)*preview->ysize;
00124 
00125         nodeAddToPreview(node, col, xs, ys, 0); /* 0 = no color management */
00126     }
00127 }
00128 
00129 void tex_output(bNode *node, bNodeStack **in, bNodeStack *out, TexFn texfn, TexCallData *cdata)
00130 {
00131     TexDelegate *dg;
00132     if (!out->data)
00133         /* Freed in tex_end_exec (node.c) */
00134         dg = out->data = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(TexDelegate), "tex delegate");
00135     else
00136         dg = out->data;
00137     
00138     dg->cdata= cdata;
00139     dg->fn = texfn;
00140     dg->node = node;
00141     memcpy(dg->in, in, MAX_SOCKET * sizeof(bNodeStack*));
00142     dg->type = out->sockettype;
00143 }
00144 
00145 void ntreeTexCheckCyclics(struct bNodeTree *ntree)
00146 {
00147     bNode *node;
00148     for (node= ntree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next) {
00149         
00150         if (node->type == TEX_NODE_TEXTURE && node->id) {
00151             /* custom2 stops the node from rendering */
00152             if (node->custom1) {
00153                 node->custom2 = 1;
00154                 node->custom1 = 0;
00155             }
00156             else {
00157                 Tex *tex = (Tex *)node->id;
00158                 
00159                 node->custom2 = 0;
00160             
00161                 node->custom1 = 1;
00162                 if (tex->use_nodes && tex->nodetree) {
00163                     ntreeTexCheckCyclics(tex->nodetree);
00164                 }
00165                 node->custom1 = 0;
00166             }
00167         }
00168 
00169     }
00170 }
